title: African Series
additional-note: Works created by the US government, including most if not all of the publications in this series, are not subject to copyright. However, copyright might still apply to volumes or included material not created by US government employees as part of their jobs. If a publication in this series has a copyright notice, you may need to check for renewals under the distinctive title of the publication, or under the title of the particular inclusion for which copyright is claimed.  We have only checked for renewals specifically filed under the 'African Series' title.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Eri Mizukane for copyright research on this title.
